positive.review: Gets rid of that pesky blue light that prevents sleep. Its got so much customizability for comfort 10/10!
Auto accepts invites and is great for customization for when sleeping in VR

its a very nice program if u happen to get tooo comfy in VRC or in VR i passed out quite a few times watching a movie this programm detected that and shut down my pc so its not staying running all night for example
If you have this, then VRCX is also great to go along with this. I use it for audio notifications and making sure my status stays on Join Me.
Gets rid of that pesky blue light that prevents sleep. Its got so much customizability for comfort 10/10!
Auto accepts invites and is great for customization for when sleeping in VR
pretty neat, it could make the light lower and theres a lot of options that make it really nice!

cool app when it works, but the app constantly seems to delete its own settings every few days which is very annoying, if nothing can be done to fix this alt least using steams native cloud saving or having some way to back up would be nice. its frustrating to constantly re set everything up
Honk shoo... Honk shoo... So eepy.
thank you for saving my bill
